duties_responsibilities.duty: Liaise with vendors, building management, and others
Manage contracts with office vendors, service providers, and office lease
Manage office G&A budget, and ensure accurate and timely reporting
Assist in the onboarding process and issuing contracts for new hires/consultants
Address employee and contractor queries regarding office management issues
Plan and assist in any in-house or off-site activities
Deal with correspondence, and maintain registrations and insurance
Assist in preparing letters, presentations, and reports

Assist the organization’s HR function by keeping personnel records up to date, and assisting in onboarding/offboarding of employees and contractors, oversee PTO, annual reviews, 401(k), QSEHRA – Health Reimbursement Administration

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Human Resources, or a related field (Master's preferred)
